## Container.fetch() method

`fetch` function for calling microservices.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(input: string, init?: RequestInit): Promise<Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | <code>string</code> |  |
|  init | <code>RequestInit</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Response>`

## Remarks

This function has same behavior as the standard `fetch` function, except it will also handle Skygear authorization mechanism automatically (e.g. attaching API key, access token, refreshing access token).
